resources.string: 1.- What parking spot number is the car parked in?
2.- Does the rite of the Catholic Church allow a man to marry his widow\'s sister?
3.- A bear leaves his house and walks a kilometer to the south after a kilometer to the east then a kilometer to the north and returns to his house. What color is the bear?.

4.-On a table there are three black hats and two white hats. Three people wear a hat at random without looking at the color and are placed in single row. The third sees the color of the two in front and is asked if he could tell what the color of his hat. He replies that he does not. The second can only see the first hat. You ask the same question and you answer no.The first does not see a hat, but… What color is his hat?

5.- The pitched roof of my house has two slopes, one with a slope of 70 degrees facing my house and another with a 60 degree incline that gives the neighbor\'s garden. Suppose a rooster puts an egg exactly on top of peak, am I going to have omelet breakfast today?

6.- Beautiful Portia has three caskets: one gold, one silver and one lead. Inside one of them is her portrait(or landscape). Her fatherâ€™s will has determined that any suitor must choose the casket with the portrait in order to win her hand in marriage. Portia has the following words written on the caskets:
Portia tells her suitor that of these three statements at most one is true. Which should he choose?
7.- In a race, a runner advances to the second runner. In what position is it placed?
8.- In a street there are 100 buildings, for some reason they lack the box that contained the number 9; If you call the number manufacturer to buy them. How many nines will you need?

9.- You have a greengrocers and they have distributed three boxes: one has only apples; Another, only oranges; The third, apples and oranges. Each box has a label: "apples", "oranges" and "apples and oranges". None of the boxes have the label that corresponds to them. If you, only, can you take a fruit out of a box, which box would you choose?
10.- In a tree there are 5 birds, with a double-barreled shotgun I kill 2 birds with a shot. How many left?
You are not right on any question
You have partially answered some questions.
